Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I just joined the forums today, even though I have been playing KSP for a long time.

It is great place here around the forums! I wish you have great time!

I would recommend you to look at th Fan Works part of the forum, there is a ton of great things! Starting from ordinary mission reports, to the most cool graphic novels and art!

I would also recommend you to make up you account! (it is beautiful already though) You can link your stuff and threads in your signature, find a lot of friends that are very common around here and share your creations in KSP!

Welcome!

Welcome! 

The forums are a great place to discuss the game or other space things, ask questions or pass on your own wisdom to other players. We also have a lot of challenges for you to participate in.

No one mentioned mods. 

*cough* I have one *cough*

There are also a lot of other great mods that can be found in addon releases.

You don't have to use mine. You really don't.

Edited June 6, 2017 by DeltaDizzy
